descriptionHtml:
My Werewolf Character! No missions done just reached Whiterun. All perks in Warrior and Stealth regions no magic perks because he is a warrior not a mage. Mods are really need for this save put all the mods in the description they are great mods made by others



MOD NAME                                                                                                                                  
THE CRUSHER - THE CRUSHER
Automatic Variants - AV Beta									
		- Legend of Cain Werewolf package 
Bloodmoon Rising - Dawnguard Werewolf Overhaul	
aMidian Born Iron and Banded Armor - aMiadian iron and banded white fur
XCE - Xenius Character Enchancement - XCE-1_10
Beards - Normal Resolution
Brows - Normal Resolution
Dawnguard Eyes - Glowing Eye Mod - Dawnguard Eyes
Heart of the Beast - Alpha werewolf sounds - VERY VICIOUS AND AGGRESSIVE
Heart of the Beast - Mesh update - Alpha werewolf model with glow maps
Heart of the Beast - Speed Upgrade
Heart of the Beast - Texture - The Alpha Werewolf
Heart of the Beast - The wolf howl - deeper version
Iron Armor variant with sleeves and chainmail-Iron Armor with sleeves-REPLACER-No ESP file
Dusks Cabin - Dusks Cabin


All these mods are better and I take no credit for them the original authors are great and I thank them!
author: coolcatkeaton
